in this post, i address the importance of protecting personal information and data privacy. the mention of "mehr als nur ein hashtag" signifies a critical view on whether social media activism is enough to ensure real-world data protection.

the post also raises questions about the safety of truly confidential information in light of numerous large-scale data breaches. the hashtag "#datenschutz" connects this discussion with ongoing conversations and initiatives related to data privacy.
